newsitem.title: HONG KONG: RESEARCH ALERT - Henderson Land upgraded.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Henderson Land upgraded.

text.p: Henderson Land Development is forecast to show net profit growth of 25 percent a year compounded for the next three year and has been upgraded to a buy, said Merrill Lynch in Hong Kong.
Analyst Henry Kwong said in a September 16 report, Henderson Land should achieve net profit growth of 24 percent for the year ending June 1997, 26 percent in 1998, and 28.4 percent in 1999.
He estimated a net asset value per share of HK$88 per share.

Kwong also forecast the company will remain Hong Kong's most successful and profitable old building assembler/re-developer as well as a major beneficiary of the government's new policy toward urban renewal.
